name: Gem Specification File
summary: Learn about .GEMSPEC files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: RubyGems are used for distributing developer libraries for the Ruby programming language.

description: Developer file that specifies the attributes of a RubyGems .GEM package; saves information such as the author, a description, an example usage, and the usage license; saved in a simple plain text format.
